member.name: T:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet

1.1 Used inside blocks
Doc source: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/enterprise/data-dictionary/native-enriched-objects/tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.CreatedAt
member.summary: UTC time when this Tweet was created. Example: Wed Oct 10 20:19:24 +0000 2018

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Id
member.summary: The integer representation of the unique identifier for this Tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.IdString
member.summary: The string representation of the unique identifier for this Tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Text
member.summary: The actual UTF-8 text of the status update

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Source
member.summary: Utility used to post the Tweet, as an HTML-formatted string

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Truncated
member.summary: Indicates whether the value of the text parameter was truncated, for example, as a result of a retweet exceeding the original Tweet text length limit of 140 characters

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.InReplyToStatusId
member.summary:
If the represented Tweet is a reply, this field will contain the integer representation of the original Tweet’s ID
Nullable

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.InReplyToStatusIdString
member.summary: Nullable. If the represented Tweet is a reply, this field will contain the string representation of the original Tweet’s ID

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.InReplyToUserId
member.summary: Nullable. If the represented Tweet is a reply, this field will contain the integer representation of the original Tweet’s author ID

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.InReplyToUserIdString
member.summary: Nullable. If the represented Tweet is a reply, this field will contain the string representation of the original Tweet’s author ID

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.InReplyToScreenName
member.summary: Nullable. If the represented Tweet is a reply, this field will contain the screen name of the original Tweet’s author

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.User
member.summary: The user who posted this Tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Coordinates
member.summary: Nullable. Represents the geographic location of this Tweet as reported by the user or client application

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Place
member.summary: Nullable When present, indicates that the tweet is associated (but not necessarily originating from) a Place

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.QuotedStatusId
member.summary: This field only surfaces when the Tweet is a quote Tweet. This field contains the integer value Tweet ID of the quoted Tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.QuotedStatusIdString
member.summary: This field only surfaces when the Tweet is a quote Tweet. This is the string representation Tweet ID of the quoted Tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.IsQuoteStatus
member.summary: Indicates whether this is a Quoted Tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.QuotedStatus
member.summary: This field only surfaces when the Tweet is a quote Tweet. This attribute contains the Tweet object of the original Tweet that was quoted

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.RetweetedStatus
member.summary: This attribute contains a representation of the original Tweet that was retweeted

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.QuoteCount
member.summary: Nullable. Indicates approximately how many times this Tweet has been quoted by Twitter users

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.ReplyCount
member.summary: Number of times this Tweet has been replied to

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.RetweetCount
member.summary: Number of times this Tweet has been retweeted

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.FavoriteCount
member.summary: Nullable. Indicates approximately how many times this Tweet has been liked by Twitter users

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Entities
member.summary: Entities which have been parsed out of the text of the Tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.ExtendedEntities
member.summary: When between one and four native photos or one video or one animated GIF are in Tweet, contains an array 'media' metadata. This is also available in Quote Tweets

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Favorited
member.summary: Nullable. Indicates whether this Tweet has been liked by the authenticating user

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Retweeted
member.summary: Indicates whether this Tweet has been Retweeted by the authenticating user

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.PossiblySensitive
member.summary: Nullable. This field only surfaces when a Tweet contains a link. The meaning of the field doesn’t pertain to the Tweet content itself, but instead it is an indicator that the URL contained in the Tweet may contain content or media identified as sensitive content

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.FilterLevel
member.summary: Indicates the maximum value of the filter_level parameter which may be used and still stream this Tweet. So a value of medium will be streamed on none, low, and medium streams

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Culture
member.summary: Nullable. When present, indicates a BCP 47 language identifier corresponding to the machine-detected language of the Tweet text, or und if no language could be detected

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.MatchingRules
member.summary: Present in filtered products such as Twitter Search and PowerTrack. Provides the id and tag associated with the rule that matched the Tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.CurrentUserRetweet
member.summary: Perspectival Only surfaces on methods supporting the include_my_retweet parameter, when set to true

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Scopes
member.summary: A set of key-value pairs indicating the intended contextual delivery of the containing Tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.WithheldCopyright
member.summary: When present and set to “true”, it indicates that this piece of content has been withheld due to a DMCA complaint

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.WithheldInCountries
member.summary: When present, indicates a list of uppercase two-letter country codes this content is withheld from. Twitter supports the following non-country values for this field: “XX” - Content is withheld in all countries “XY” - Content is withheld due to a DMCA request

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.WithheldScope
member.summary: When present, indicates whether the content being withheld is the “status” or a “user”

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.Tweet.Geo
member.summary: Deprecated. Nullable. Use the coordinates field instead. This deprecated attribute has its coordinates formatted as [lat, long], while all other Tweet geo is formatted as [long, lat].

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.DisplayUrl
member.summary: URL of the media to display to clients

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.ExpandedUrl
member.summary: An expanded version of display_url. Links to the media display page

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.Id
member.summary: ID of the media expressed as a 64-bit integer

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.IdString
member.summary: ID of the media expressed as a string

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.Indices
member.summary: An array of integers indicating the offsets within the Tweet text where the URL begins and ends

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.MediaUrl
member.summary: An http:// URL pointing directly to the uploaded media file

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.MediaUrlHttps
member.summary: An https:// URL pointing directly to the uploaded media file, for embedding on https pages

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.Sizes
member.summary: An object showing available sizes for the media file

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.SourceStatusId
member.summary: Nullable. For Tweets containing media that was originally associated with a different tweet, this ID points to the original Tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.SourceStatusIdString
member.summary: Nullable. For Tweets containing media that was originally associated with a different tweet, this string-based ID points to the original Tweet

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.Type
member.summary: Type of uploaded media. Possible types include photo, video, and animated_gif

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMedia.Url
member.summary: Wrapped URL for the media link. This corresponds with the URL embedded directly into the raw Tweet text, and the values for the indices parameter

member.summary: Width in pixels of this size

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMediaSize.Height
member.summary: Height in pixels of this size

member.name: P:Osnova.Net.Twitter.TweetMediaSize.Resize
member.summary: Resizing method used to obtain this size. A value of fit means that the media was resized to fit one dimension, keeping its native aspect ratio. A value of crop means that the media was cropped in order to fit a specific resolution

member.summary: 1.1 Doc src: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/enterprise/data-dictionary/native-enriched-objects/entities
